statements: DELETE FROM patterns_and_trends WHERE user_id = 123 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM patterns_and_trends WHERE user_id = 123 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM patterns_and_trends WHERE query LIKE '%example%' AND result IS NULL;
DELETE FROM data_science_projects WHERE project_id = 10 AND project_owner = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM patterns WHERE pattern_name = 'example' AND pattern_description LIKE '%analytics%'
DELETE FROM products WHERE stock_quantity <= 10 AND category = 'Electronics';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE quantity <= 10 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
